lang module¶

lang.check_linux_os()[source]¶

Check which linux system is being run

Parameters: none

Returns: String:Return the linux distribution

@author: Álvaro García Infante

lang.check_os()[source]¶

Check which OS is being used by the system

Parameters: none

Returns: int: Returns 1 if it is windows or 0 if it is not

@author: Álvaro García Infante

lang.detect_language()[source]¶

Method to detect the language of the system

Parameters: none

Returns: String: Language of the system

@author: Álvaro García Infante

lang.get_mensajes(term)[source]¶

Return the message in the correct language

Parameters: term (String): Name of the term to be returned

Returns: String: Message to be returned

@author: Álvaro García Infante

lang.set_language(param)[source]¶

Set the language of the system

Parameters: param (string): Language

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

DSL (Lenguaje de Dominio Específico) para configurar un servidor de forma segura
